resources.string: Here are a couple of reasons why you\'ll want to have a Terms and Conditions for a mobile app
1. You can stop abusive users from using your app.\n 2. You can terminate or block accounts at your sole discretion.\n 3. Liability to users will be limited.

A Terms and Conditions could legally protect your photo store. It is in this type of legal agreement where you set the rules that your customers would follow during a purchase and limit your liability in the event that your products fail.
